contest-event.event-date: Feb. 3, 1980 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Life Divine Bowburn Community Centre, County Durham Prizes - 1st £30 and trophy, 2nd £20 and cup, 3rd £15 and trophy. 5 bands competed. Aug. 2, 2010, 4:27 p.m. Dec. 16, 2014, 9:20 a.m. 1 Crookhall Colliery Keith MacDonald 2 Westoe Band Raymond Poole 3 British Steel Teesside Ken Robinson 4 Lingdale Silver Band Alan Morrison 5 Fishburn Band Jim Foxcroft Withdrawn NASUWT Riverside Unknown Withdrawn Washington Welfare George Rowell
